title.narrative: Viable Support to Transition and Stability (VISTAS)

description.narrative: (South Sudan): FY 2017 funding for this award will focus on strengthening local capacities for peaceful coexistence between communities in key conflict-affected areas of South Sudan; supporting inclusive local and national peace processes; and mitigating the impacts of conflict in areas of strategic importance to national peace and stability. Interventions will contribute to transition and conflict mitigation in those areas of the country where conflict has national-level implications. The mechanism will address community security, support consensus-building and tailor responses to local contexts as needs evolve.
